This page displays all your favorited pages from this website.

Click the heart icon (♡) on any page to add it to your favorites. The heart will turn red (❤) when a page is in your favorites. Your favorites will be displayed here and persist even if you close your browser.

To remove a page from your favorites, either:
1. Click the heart icon again on that page
2. Click the "×" button next to the page in the list above
